body_html: If you want me to adjust (in some way) the application table for this, I'd suggest to simply throw in a new issue and assign it to me. For its core functionality, I think this PR could be savely merged before that. No reason to access the applications' table now anyways.

body: If you want me to adjust (in some way) the application table for this, I'd suggest to simply throw in a new issue and assign it to me. For its core functionality, I think this PR could be savely merged before that. No reason to access the applications' table now anyways.
